name: Spiderman Demake
description:
This game is a demake of spiderman, it was one of my unviersity game jam games for a project.

A demake is a game that was modern that we had to remake in the style of the atari games.

It has all the web swinging, wall crawling adn webbing of the new spiderman games just with a retro tint.

Plays better when using a controller.

Controls Controller   KeyboardJump/SwingASpaceMoveLeft Stick
WASDPunchBEWeb Shot
Left Stick Down + B
S + E
Full ScreenAlt + Enter
